title: Scribe
description: NefeTari Turaeud has just lost her grandfather...Well, sort of.After years of taking care of her grandfather the time had come for someone else to take over. Enter the Beauregard Senior Assisted Living Community. It's posh, it let's him have his freedom, and its only a few blocks away from home. It's perfect and convenient To bad her grandfather never actually gets to enjoy it. It's sad but it's a part of life and she is slowly learning to cope with it. If that wasn't enough to deal with, her grandfather comes to her in a dream and informs her that evil will be coming for her and it was time that she faced her destiny. When her destiny reveals to her that she is the descendant from a long ancient line of Egyptian Scribes that protect time and history, Tari doesn't think she can take anymore surprises. But its one surprise after another and she soon finds out that her destiny may include more than just a bit of time travel...
author: S.K. Whiteside
